nodes.text: The Razzi Syndicate was a criminal syndicate and crime family run by the crime lord and bounty hunter Latts Razzi during the Imperial Era. Members of the syndicate bore designations consisting of their role and a number, such as Prowling Thug 36, the Esoomain brawler Bumblethunk, or Pickpocket 8, the Rybet thief "Sticky Fingers." Razzi was assisted by a submister, with the Adarian Twirm holding the role at the time that the book that would become known as the Smuggler's Guide fell into the syndicate's possession after "Sticky Fingers" lifted it from the gambler Landonis Calrissian after he was beaten up by Bumblethunk.
The Razzi Syndicate was first mentioned in the 2018 reference book Star Wars: Smuggler's Guide, which was written by Daniel Wallace.
